"The number of web server cyber attacks globally and in Vietnam are antagonistic in the first three quarters, but both markets saw a drop in the fourth quarter of 2019. However, Vietnam's signal was somewhat more positive with the number of attacks dropping sharply compared to Q3, helping the country move from 10th position in Q3 to 19th in Q4 rankings. This is a good sign for the website and information security situation in Vietnam," the report said. … [Read more...] about Vietnam sees huge drop in cyber attacks: security firm
